titleStmt.title: The general pardon geuen longe agone, and sythe newly confyrmed, by our almightie Father, with many large priuileges, grauntes, and bulles graunted for euer, as it is to be seen hereafter: drawne out of Frenche, into English. By VVyllyam Hayvvard.
titleStmt.author: Hayward, William, fl. 1570-1576.

publicationStmt.publisher: By VVyllyam Hovv, for VVyllyam Pickeringe,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; leaves A6-B4 are torn, only inner halves of leaves remain.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
